Top 10 Expert Tips to Accelerate Your Agency in 2021 with Jay Baer

[vc_text_separator title=”45-Minute Session” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider” css=”.vc_custom_1611339745362{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618843243857{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Part of our Agency GROWTH Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]One of the world’s most powerful speakers, Jay Baer, shares the best advice he pulled from our Agency Growth Series speakers, including how to be the helper (not the hero), ways to value your own agency, and why being specific beats general any day of the week.

He covers tips from names like Seth Godin, Ann Handley, Shama Hyder and so many more, as well as gives his own guidance on how to make 2021 your best year yet. You can also check out all the session recordings from our Agency Growth Series to hear each speaker’s advice for yourself.[/vc_column_text]

Hosts

[vc_row][vc_column]

Jay Baer

Founder, Convince & Convert

Jay is a hype-free digital marketing and customer service strategist, speaker, New York Times best-selling author of six books, and a technology investor. He founded Convince & Convert in 2008, and it is his fifth multi-million dollar venture. Jay’s Social Pros show was named Best Marketing Podcast in the Content Marketing Awards. He’s also the most retweeted person in the world among digital marketers, and one of the top 3 most influential people online among CMOs and B2B Marketers. At Convince & Convert, he oversees big picture strategy while educating and informing businesspeople on stage and on the page.read more...

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column]

Chip House

CMO, SharpSpring

Chip House is CMO at SharpSpring. A well-known executive in the email marketing industry, Chip has extensive experience with organizational development and go-to-market strategies in early- to mid-stage B2B SaaS companies. At SharpSpring, Chip drives strategy for the marketing team, leading content, lead generation, marketing operations and more.

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
